## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b38d98c47aceac75b944aff9d0df30a563d89aaa076329820aa58b119e010448)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tanstack-virtual-core' @ 9999.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
